de'i steng du bam yongs su gyur pa las sna tshogs pa dma de'i steng du hum yongs su gyur pa las sna tshogs rdo rje bsams te/ 'byung ba rnams zhu zhing sla ba'i rang bzhin du gyur nas gcig tu 'dres pas ri rab 'og tu ltung bas 'byung ba zhu ba'i gong bu sna tshogs rdo
rje'i steng du chags pa yongs su gyur pa las gzhal med khang sgo rim pa bzhi dang ldan pa ste/
rin po che bzhi'i ] D; rin po che gzhi'i P. dbus su ni chos kyi 'byung gnas gru gsum pa'i nang du'o//(D 5r7)

gsum pa grwa Inga pa dang/
bzhi par zur drug pa'i nang du ste/
mdog dmar po steng du bltas pa rnams so//
dkyil 'khor gsum ni zlum po yin la kun gyi phyi ma ni gru bzhi pa ste/
kun kyang gzhal yas khang gi rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa dur khrod dang (D 5v1) bcas pa'o//
dkyil 'khor nang ma ni g-yas g-yon gnyis kyi rlung gnyis dbu mar 'dus pa'i rang bzhin gnag pa dang sngo ba'i rtsig pa gnyis pa'o//
gnyis pa ni sku gsung thugs dag pa'i rang bzhin sngo ba dang dmar po dang dkar po'i rtsig pa gsum dang Idan pa'o/ / (D 5v2)
gsum pa ni dga' ba bzhi dag pa'i rang bzhin sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu'i ri mo bzhi dang Idan pa'o//
kun gyi phyi rol ni ye shes Inga dag pa ste phyi rol du dkar po dang bcas pa'o//

bzhi pa la ] D; bzhi grwa ] D; gru P. pa las P. po dang kun gyi dkyil 'khor dbus maʼi dbus su sna tshogs pa dma 'dab ma bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa/ (D 5v3) lte ba la nyi ma'i steng du 'jigs byed chen dus kyi mtshan mo'o//

rim pa bzhin du (1) gri gug dang (2) rin po che dang (3) rdo rje dang (4) pa dma dang (5) 'khor lo dang (6) ral gri dang (7) sna tshogs rdo rje dang (8) thod pa dang (9) mgo bo dang (10) keng rus dang (11) zhags pa dang (12) lcags kyu'i phreng ba rnams kyis bskor ba'o//

de gnyis kyi dbus su steng gi hūm zhugs te/
'khor lo bcu gnyis kyi lha rnams spros te/
'gro ba thams cad de'i bdag nyid can du byas nas 'dus te/

āḥ dmar po las yum gyi pa dma dmar po'dab ma gsum pa/ dyām dkar ser las ze 'bru de nyid kyis mtshan pa/ bu gar phat ser po mgo phyir bstan pa'o//

de nas rig ma la rdo rje phag mo'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po dang bcom Idan 'das kyi snying po dang nye ba'i snying po rim pa ji lta bus lte ba dang snying ga dang mgrin pa dang dpral bar bkod de tsu mba na zhes bya'o//
de bzhin du bcom Idan 'das mas kyang/ de nyid kyi snying po dang nye ba'i snying po mgrin pa dang dpral bar bkod de rang nyid kyi lte ba dang snying gar bkod la tsu mba na zhes bya'o//

mi dmigs pa las ] D; mi dmigs pa la P. snying ga dang mgrin pa dang ] D; snying kha dang mgrin pa P◊ tsu mba na zhes ] D; tsum pa na P. tsu mba na zhes ] D; tsum pa na P ◇ For this passage, see Prajñārakṣita's Cakrasamvarābhisamayapañjikā / tathā svahṛdayopahṛdayamantrābhyām kanthe lalāte ca/bhagavatim bhagavan cumbayet // bhagavati ca bhagavaddhṛdayopahṛdayamantrābhyām kanthalalāṭayor bhagavantam cumbayet //.
